Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29709564]DENV-2(dengue virus serotype 2):inhibition of virus entry in HUVECs(human umbilical vein endothelial cells)(65 ± 6% inhibition at 40 μM,55± 12% inhibition at 20 μM,41± 13% inhibition at 10 μM,IC50=12.86±5.96µM);DENV-1(dengue virus serotype 1):inhibition of virus entry in HUVECs(human umbilical vein endothelial cells)(65 ± 12% inhibition at 40 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.29709564]No toxic effect on HUVEC(Human umbilical vein endothelial cells) at concentrations up to 100 µM
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: might be involved in blocking viral entry via occupying the binding site in the receptor on the host cell(β3 integrin).

Literature.Title: Peptides P4 and P7 derived from E protein inhibit entry of dengue virus serotype 2 via interacting with β3 integrin.
Literature.Author: Cui X, Wu Y, Fan D, Gao N, Ming Y, Wang P, An J.
